sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Banner, List, Container, Callout, Gallery, FAQ, Team } from '../components/blocks'
import { Box, Button } from 'rebass'
import Link from 'next/link'
// import CTA from '../components/cta'
import Sponsors from '../components/sponsors'
import Photo from '../components/photo'

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<Banner>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components}>{`AngelHacks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components}>{`High schoolers: learn to code in 24 hours of free food & fun.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`October 26, 2019 @ Snapchat HQ in LA`}</MDXTag>
<Link href="/register">
  <Button
    as="a"
    sx={{
      bg: 'accent',
      color: 'white',
      borderRadius: 'circle',
      fontFamily: 'inherit',
      fontSize: [2, 3],
      lineHeight: 2,
      cursor: 'pointer',
      px: 4,
      mt: [3, 4],
      transition: 'transform ease .125s',
      ':hover, :focus': {
        transform: 'scale(1.0625)'
      }
    }}>
    Register now ¬ª
  </Button>
</Link>
</Banner>
<Container
  width="narrow"
  sx={{
    p: {
      fontSize: [2, 3, 4],
      color: 'muted',
      mb: [4, 5],
      lineHeight: 1.375,
      letterSpacing: '-.009em'
    },
    strong: {
      fontWeight: 'medium',
      color: 'text'
    }
  }}>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`AngelHacks is a 24-hour hackathon.`}</MDXTag>{`
50 students from across LA will come for the weekend.
You‚Äôll work with a team to build an app, game, or website.
We‚Äôll provide free meals & drinks. In the morning, judges will pick
the best projects to demo for everyone and win prizes.
`}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`You‚Äôll meet people, create amazing new things, & have fun.`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</Container>
<Gallery>
<Photo alt="Collaborating" src="https://cdn.glitch.com/3d283e0f-19c4-4546-b0b2-223ec3a7dc23%2Fcollaborating.jpg?v=1565769226508" />
<Photo showAlt alt="Students build projects in groups" src="https://cdn.glitch.com/3d283e0f-19c4-4546-b0b2-223ec3a7dc23%2Fworking.jpg?v=1565769221347" />
<Box variant="card">
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components}>{`A place for everyone.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Underrepresented students are systematically discouraged from pursuing tech. AngelHacks provides a supportive community for women, minorities, & LGBTQ+ students, and gives them the resources to make amazing things. No matter who you are, you‚Äôre welcome here‚Äîand you‚Äôll surprise yourself by what you can accomplish. üíõ`}</MDXTag>
</Box>
<Photo showAlt alt="Workshops teach intro coding skills" src="https://cdn.glitch.com/3d283e0f-19c4-4546-b0b2-223ec3a7dc23%2Fworkshop.jpg?v=1565769230073" />
</Gallery>
<Container>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components}>{`FAQ`}</MDXTag>
<Callout sx={{ mx: [null, null, -3, -4] }}>
<FAQ>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`How much does it cost?`}</MDXTag>{`
Nothing! Registration and attendance are 100% free, with meals, drinks, swag, & workshops included.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Who can participate?`}</MDXTag>{`
Any current student grades 8‚Äì12. If you‚Äôre under/over that age, send us a chat message (in the bottom right corner) & we‚Äôll see what we can do.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Hacking‚ÄΩ Is that safe?`}</MDXTag>{`
No, we‚Äôre not ‚Äúhacking‚Äù servers. The word is being constructively redefined for coding‚Äîapps, games, websites. It‚Äôs safe, supervised, & entirely educational.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`What can I make?`}</MDXTag>{`
Anything! A website, app, game, hardware hack, you name it. Judges will rate projects on creativity, technical skill demonstrated, polish, and utility.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`What if I‚Äôm new to coding?`}</MDXTag>{`
At AngelHacks, complete beginners are not only welcome, but expected! Learn as you go with our intro workshops & mentors.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Do I need a team?`}</MDXTag>{`
Nope! You‚Äôll have an opportunity to meet fellow hackers and make teams of up to 4‚Äîfind some new friends, bring yours, or work alone.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`What should I bring?`}</MDXTag>{`
Plan to bring a student ID, computer (any kind), chargers, anything for your hack (e.g. hardware), toiletries, & a sleeping bag (if you plan on sleeping).`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Who runs this? Is it supervised?`}</MDXTag>{`
We‚Äôre independently-organized by high schoolers, sponsored via a nonprofit called `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://hackclub.com/"}}>{`Hack Club`}</MDXTag>{`. It‚Äôs fully supervised by 20+ adult mentors & chaperones.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</FAQ>
</Callout>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components}>{`Sponsors`}</MDXTag>
<Sponsors />
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components}>{`Additional support from`}</MDXTag>
<Sponsors section="additionalSupport" />
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components}>{`Team`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`AngelHacks is primarily run by the Hack Club at `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://www.washingtonpost.com/technology/2018/06/27/elon-musk-created-secretive-laboratory-school-brilliant-kids-who-love-flamethrowers/"}}>{`Ad Astra`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<Team sx={{ mt: [3, 4] }}>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"https://cdn.glitch.com/747f5921-6fdc-45db-8eaa-ac12523e0e6c%2Fclaire.jpg?v=1566231402289","alt":"Claire"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Claire Wang`}</MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="p">{`Founder, lead. she/her`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"https://cdn.glitch.com/747f5921-6fdc-45db-8eaa-ac12523e0e6c%2Fclaire.jpg?v=1566231402289","alt":"Kai"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Kai Musk`}</MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="p">{`Marketing. he/him`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"https://cdn.glitch.com/747f5921-6fdc-45db-8eaa-ac12523e0e6c%2Fclaire.jpg?v=1566231402289","alt":"Damian"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Damian Musk`}</MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="p">{`Operations. he/him`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</Team>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components}>{`Special thanks`}</MDXTag>
<Team sx={{ mb: [4, 5] }}>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"./static/profiles/yasper.jpg","alt":"Yasper"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Yasper DeJong`}</MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="p">{`Local coordinator. he/him`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"https://github.com/pErs0nZ.png","alt":"Evan"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Evan Nishi`}</MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="p">{`Advisor. he/him`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"https://cdn.glitch.com/747f5921-6fdc-45db-8eaa-ac12523e0e6c%2Fneel.jpg?v=1566231402477","alt":"Neel"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Neel Redkar`}</MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="p">{`XYZ. he/him`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</Team>
</Container></MDXTag>
